login.title: WELCOME TO DEATH CLOTHE
login.description:
DeathClothe is a circular fashion platform that offers buying, selling, and discovering second-hand clothing with personalized recommendations based on your virtual wardrobe.
        Its intuitive experience connects users interested in authenticity, style, and sustainability, giving new life to unique garments.
        More than a digital marketplace, it is a community space where style evolves with purpose.
login.highlight: Revolutionize your style and care for the planet: buy, sell, and discover second-hand fashion easily, quickly, and securely.
login.name: Name
login.terms: I accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
